ISSUE.TITLE: Power outlet status
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.1 ### Feature type New functionality ### Triage priority N/A ### Proposed functionality Add a field for power outlet status ### Use case It would be useful for switched PDUs or for three phase PDUs when opening the breaker, disabling a bank of outlets ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes: #15924 - Prevent API payload from allowing tagged_vlans while interface mode is set to tagged-all (#17211)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: For #18352, adds choices, model field, migration Adds: - dcim.choices.PowerOutletStatusChoices - dcim.models.device_components.PowerOutlet.status field with `choices` set to PowerOutletStatusChoices - adds migration for PowerOutlet.status field - updates breaking view tests
For #18352, adds PowerOutlet.status field to forms and filtersets
Merge pull request #18748 from netbox-community/18352-add-poweroutlet-status Closes #18352: Adds PowerOutlet.status field
